result.title: Premium handles
result.content:
Hello Codeforces, and happy new year !

Codeforces team is adding a feature in registration page, Premium handles !

I know, it sounds amazing, doesn't it !?

Prices are like this :

  • One month : $9.99 (USD)
  • Three months : $19.99 (USD)
  • Six months : $49.99 (USD)
  • One year : $89.99 (USD)
  • Three years : $249.99 (USD)
  • Ten years : $699.99

This feature will be enabled on January 11th.

With this kind of handles :

You can have doubled time and memory limits, access to tags (even in a running contest), ability to see the input of the testcase(s) your code failed one, you can publish your blogs on the homepage and so other things.

Also, you can charge your account and buy these :

  • Skip a testcase with $1.99
  • Increase contribution by 10 with $5.99
  • Increase rating by 50 with $19.99
  • Ban a user for $99.99
  • Read a source code in a running contest for $19.99
  • Buy coach mode with only $9.99
  • Increase/Decrease someone else's contribution buy 10 only with $9.99
  • Increase/Decrease someone else's rating buy 50 only with $59.99
  • Decrease your rank in a contest by 20 only with $3.99
  • Own someone else's group with $99.99
  • Buy the right of a problem with $29.99

And too many other features that will be added.

Happy new year, Max Akhmedov.
